pullRequest.body:
I realized that the monoid composition `⊗≫` can be defined without depending on the free monoid category, and that it is still useful.

---

```suggestion
the desired morphism as `𝟙 _ ⊗≫ V₁ ◁ R V₂ V₃ ▷ V₄ ▷ V₅ ⊗≫ 𝟙 _`.
```
The second identity would actually be `𝟙 (V₁ ⊗ V₃ ⊗ V₂ ⊗ V₄ ⊗ V₅)`
Thank you for finding the mistake!
